Module com.oniverse.maze_runner
Package com.oniverse.neon_dystopia.model.levels.maze

Class Maze

java.lang.Object
com.oniverse.neon_dystopia.model.levels.maze.Maze
public class Maze extends Object
This class is used to define a maze. It's an ArrayList of blocks.
See Also:

  • ArrayList

  • Field Details

    • mazeProperties

      private final MazeProperties mazeProperties
      The properties of the maze. (size, id, ...)
      See Also:
      • MazeProperties

    • blocks

      private final ArrayList<Block> blocks
      The blocks of the maze. We didn't take care of the order of the blocks because we use the coordinate to get the block.
      See Also:
      • Block
      • Coordinate
      • ArrayList

      The constructor of the Maze class. It is used to define the maze.

      blocks - The blocks of the maze. Take from the xml file.

    • getPlayersSpawn

      public Block getPlayersSpawn()
      Get the spawn of the player. It's the block with the id START. It's used to spawn the player.
      Returns:
      The start block.

    • getPlayerEnd

      public Block getPlayerEnd()
      Get the end of the maze. It's the block with the id END. It's used to know if the player has finished the maze.
      Returns:
      The end block.

    • getBlocks

      public ArrayList<Block> getBlocks()
